thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Paul Allen

author: Paul Allen
title: Paul Allen
text: Gold car rental at Seville airport in Spain are excellent. The prices are very competitive and the check-in desk is located only a short walk from the car park. The return process is a quick and easy and, again, located only a short walk from the departure gate. This is really useful when you're rushing to catch a plane. Would definitely a hire a car from them in the future.
